snippet: The United Nations World Food Program was responding to reports that the Islamic State was distributing its aid bags but rebranded with the militants’ logo.
abstract: United Nations World Food Program voices its concern over possible manipulation of its Syrian aid after website posts apparently showed Islamic State supporters distributing its relief bags.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations World Food Program was responding to reports that the Islamic State was distributing its aid bags but rebranded with the militants’ logo.

headline.main: U.N. Concerned About Reports That Food Aid to Syria Is in ISIS Hands
headline.print_headline: Syria: U.N. Agency Expresses Concern That ISIS Is Distributing Its Food Aid

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
